data.text: @tinakarenk @DEADLINE Listen we are all offended that he made a joke about his obsessive desire to attract women, especially by using situation were it would be almost unbelievably ABSURD to think about that obsession, like the Holocaust.
@JonnyIROC @DEADLINE I understand the difference between a predator and a jokester!   Don’t dare say anything about Larry David’s comedy, generally hilarious!
@tinakarenk @DEADLINE Agreed his need to make social comment on his obsessive desire to attract women in ANY situation is shameful. He should keep his obsessions to himself.
@DEADLINE No one remembers the Schindler's List episode of Seinfeld, do they?
@DEADLINE I love Larry David’s comedy, but from a Holocaust survivor and victim’s family, I couldn’t believe or accept the joke on SNL, very upsetting
